column2: UPDATE 2-Valeant psoriasis drug's suicide risk hard to assess -FDA Staff July 15 Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc's experimental drug to treat the skin disorder psoriasis carries a potential risk of suicide that is challenging to assess due to limited data
column3: according to a preliminary review by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration published on Friday.

column2: S&P; 500's record highs held back by Apple's falling stock price SAN FRANCISCO
column3: July 15 The S&P; 500's multiple record highs set this week after more than a year-long wait on Wall Street would not have taken so long had Apple Inc
column5: not fallen deeply from its own all-time high.

column2: CORRECTED-UPDATE 8-Oil steady
column3: eyeing weekly gain; muted impact from rig count NEW YORK
column4: July 15 Oil prices were steady on Friday
column5: on track for a weekly gain
column6: after data from top energy consumers the United States and China boosted the oil demand outlook.
